Metadata.Title: CVE-2010-2249 affecting package syslinux for versions less than libpng-1.2.44
Metadata.Description: CVE-2010-2249 affecting package syslinux for versions less than libpng-1.2.44. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package syslinux is earlier than libpng-1.2.44, affected by CVE-2010-2249
